title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Accelerating Engineering: Cross-Industry HPC Cloud Transformations (CMP302)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 加速工程：跨行业HPC云转型 (CMP302)
abstract: This breakout session highlights how AWS HPC is transforming engineering and product development across industries. From accelerating prototyping cycles to scaling semiconductor design, organizations are overcoming traditional on-premises limitations with the cloud. You’ll hear how global R&D teams are leveraging AWS HPC instances, Elastic Fabric Adapter, FSx for Lustre, and ParallelCluster to achieve faster design iterations, reduced time-to-market, and more efficient innovation at scale. Join us to see how AWS empowers engineers and researchers to push boundaries in simulation, design, and development across automotive, semiconductor, and consumer product domains.
abstract_cn: 本分会重点介绍 AWS HPC 如何在各行业中变革工程和产品开发。从加速原型设计周期到扩展半导体设计，各组织正在通过云计算克服传统本地部署的局限性。您将了解全球研发团队如何利用 AWS HPC 实例、Elastic Fabric Adapter、FSx for Lustre 和 ParallelCluster 实现更快的设计迭代、缩短上市时间以及更高效的大规模创新。加入我们，了解 AWS 如何赋能工程师和研究人员在汽车、半导体和消费品领域突破仿真、设计和开发的边界。

presenter.name: Thierry Pellegrino
presenter.title: Director WWSO Core and Advanced Computing
